description: Try our easy to follow Tiramisu Parfaits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tiramisu Parfaits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dissolve the coffee in the 1/2 cup boiled water. Stir in marsala wine. Set aside to cool.
Place eggs and icing mixture in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water. Beat until pale and thick. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. Stir in mascarpone.

Break sponge fingers into pieces. Dip into coffee mixture and layer into tall glasses (at least 1 1/2-cup-capacity) pour over with the custard mix and a layer of chocolate sauce, repeat to almost fill the glass, and chill.
Top parfaits with whipped cream, remaining chocolate sauce and grated chocolate to serve.
